doctors.name: Dr. Ayesha Rahman
doctors.description: Dr. Ayesha Rahman is a highly experienced dermatologist with over a decade of dedicated service in skin care. She specializes in treating common and chronic skin conditions and is known for her compassionate, patient-first approach.

doctors.name: Dr. Sameer Chowdhury
doctors.description: Dr. Sameer Chowdhury provides holistic pediatric care with a focus on preventive medicine and long-term wellness. His approachable nature makes him a favorite among children and their parents.

doctors.name: Dr. Nusrat Hossain
doctors.description: With a strong academic foundation and years of clinical practice, Dr. Nusrat Hossain excels in diagnosing complex gynecological conditions and managing women’s health across all ages.

doctors.name: Dr. Imran Ali
doctors.description: Dr. Imran Ali blends modern clinical practices with deep empathy, ensuring his patients receive not just treatment but comprehensive care and education about their health conditions.

doctors.name: Dr. Farzana Ahmed
doctors.description: A young and passionate neurologist, Dr. Farzana Ahmed is committed to improving community health. Her areas of interest include migraines, epilepsy, and neurodevelopmental disorders.

doctors.name: Dr. Hasan Mahmud
doctors.description: With years of experience in both urban and rural healthcare facilities, Dr. Hasan Mahmud is adept at handling a wide range of digestive issues and believes in building strong doctor-patient relationships.

doctors.name: Dr. Tasnim Jahan
doctors.description: Dr. Tasnim Jahan brings clinical accuracy to her consultations, with expertise in diagnostic medicine. She often collaborates with lab specialists to provide detailed treatment insights.

doctors.name: Dr. Rafid Karim
doctors.description: Known for his energy and friendly manner, Dr. Rafid Karim offers modern, evidence-based treatment approaches. He regularly engages in child health awareness programs.

doctors.name: Dr. Mahfuz Rahim
doctors.description: Dr. Mahfuz Rahim is well-versed in managing lifestyle-related neurological disorders and promotes a preventive approach to long-term brain health.

doctors.name: Dr. Lamiya Sultana
doctors.description: Respected for her diagnostic precision and patient care philosophy, Dr. Lamiya Sultana ensures her patients are fully informed and involved in every skin-related treatment decision.

doctors.name: Dr. Nabil Zaman
doctors.description: Dr. Nabil Zaman combines scientific rigor with clear communication, making him a reliable physician for both acute and chronic digestive issues in all age groups.

doctors.name: Dr. Rida Tabassum
doctors.description: Dr. Rida Tabassum is a compassionate doctor dedicated to elderly care. Her warm demeanor and patience make her particularly suited to treating senior citizens with multiple comorbidities.

doctors.name: Dr. Azfar Siddiqui
doctors.description: An expert neurologist and researcher, Dr. Azfar Siddiqui balances patient care with medical innovation. He mentors young doctors and participates in public health studies.

doctors.name: Dr. Tania Ferdous
doctors.description: Dr. Tania Ferdous is known for her excellent listening skills and holistic approach to women’s health. Her focus is on mental and physical well-being through personalized care.

doctors.name: Dr. Zayed Hassan
doctors.description: With a strong presence in community child health events, Dr. Zayed Hassan is passionate about disease prevention and health literacy. His clinics are known for their friendly environment.
